files.content: import { PlusIcon } from 'lucide-react' import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { Tooltip, TooltipContent, TooltipTrigger } from '@/components/ui/tooltip' const IconButtonTooltipDemo = () => { return ( Add new item ) } export default IconButtonTooltipDemo
